dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
A distributed Hyperband implementation with lots of room for
improvement
dependent_to.name: py-hpbandster

dependent_to.description:
Quickly and easily parallelize Python functions using IPython on a
cluster, supporting multiple schedulers. Optimizes IPython defaults to
handle larger clusters and simultaneous processes.
dependent_to.name: py-ipython-cluster-helper

dependent_to.description:
The oslo.utils library provides support for common utility type
functions, such as encoding, exception handling, string manipulation,
and time handling.
dependent_to.name: py-oslo-utils

dependent_to.description:
RADICAL-Utils contains shared code and tools for various RADICAL-
Cybertools packages.
dependent_to.name: py-radical-utils

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
